Reviews.Author: Bongani  Zimuto
Reviews.Content: Am loving this one, Great phone, i however need some assisatnce in finding a trust worthy site for unlocking from AT & T, please help

Reviews.Title: CLAIM
Reviews.Author: omar
Reviews.Content: From the ManufacturerApple New iPhone 16GB (Black) - UnlockedProduct Description= BRAND NEW = UNDER AN APPLE WARRANTY = IN ORIGINAL BOX WITH ALL BRAND NEW ACCSESSORIES = iPhone in FACTORY PLASTIC = FACTORY UNLOCKED = With EXTRA: 1) CAR CHARGER, 2) SIM CARD TRAY REMOVER - for FREE from NSTORE = FAST SHIPPING = Ship to International by = EXPRESS = with Online Track ID. Have a questions, please send email.I DIDN'T GET THE "EXTRA" MEANING THE CAR CHARGER AND THE SIM CARD TRAY REMOVER, ALSO THE PHONE WASN'T UNLOCKED. I WANT A RECONPENSE BECAUSE I DIDN'T GET ALL THE THINGS THAT YOU OFFER AND ABOVE ALL BECAUSE I CAN'T USE THE PHONE IN THIS COUNTRY UNLESS I UNLOCKED IT AND I HAVE TO PAY FOR THAT.

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: ramo
Reviews.Content: it s like new as described in the listingits a great item i like it and love this iphone

Reviews.Title: Very good!
Reviews.Author: Hengstar
Reviews.Content: The iPhone 5s is in a very good condition. I started use it immediately when I got it. It's a locked model, only AT&T; sim card available.

Reviews.Title: Very fast phone
Reviews.Author: Jeremy Schurbon
Reviews.Content: I have had iphone 4, iphone 5 and now the 5s. This is the fastest iphone I have had yet. Wifi is a lot more stable, the tethering works very well and the 4g lte service from AT&t; in the northern Delaware area has been very fast. Camera is better than the 5 as well.

Reviews.Title: malfunctions alot
Reviews.Author: Erin Lofton
Reviews.Content: sound wavers. signal is shotty. constantly have to restart. NOT WORTH THE MONEY. very disappointed. was not up to par with what the description said.

Reviews.Title: Exactly what I wanted!
Reviews.Author: Jessica Delgado
Reviews.Content: I ordered another IPhone before this one & was given one with scratches & the lock screen did not work. This one came as explained in the bio! Works great came in mint condition I love my IPhone!

Reviews.Title: Great Service
Reviews.Author: Michelle
Reviews.Content: I needed to recieve this by Christmas as a gift for my boyfriend and did!  The seller has great communication via email, and inturn was able to provide ideal customer service.  The product is working great and my boyfriend had the best christmas ever. Thank you!

Reviews.Title: No problem iPhone
Reviews.Author: Courts
Reviews.Content: My iPhone 5s is exactly what I expected. It is great quality, totally legit and brand spanking new in the box.

Reviews.Title: Amazing product, poor description
Reviews.Author: Matias Martinez Blanquier
Reviews.Content: I didn't read all description, so I thought that the product was available for all phone carriers. When I wanted to activate with other carrier and I couldn't do that, I reread the complete description and understood which was my problem.

Reviews.Author: Ashley Strang
Reviews.Content: I was scared to buy a phone online because I didn't want it to be broken, but I'm so happy this phone is perfect. Works great no scratches. Very friendly, buy their stuff!

Reviews.Title: Great Phone!
Reviews.Author: Ammon
Reviews.Content: Apple always makes a great product! They put lots of time and effort into ensuring that their products are top of the line. This phone has great security with the finger print scanner, and the better processor makes it extremely fast! Better battery life is another great feature. Great phone!

Reviews.Title: Lost time, Money and effort
Reviews.Author: Jennifer smith
Reviews.Content: I purchased this phone from the seller and when I received it I was unable to use it. I invested alot of time and money trying to fix it and couldn't. The seller would not communicate with me about the phone when I was trying to fix it so it was returned to seller. My experience with this product was very stressful to say the least.

Reviews.Title: Claim
Reviews.Author: Alex Cedenova
Reviews.Content: I did not get the car charger and the cell phone was not unblocked how do I contact you?Alex

Reviews.Title: Pro's and Con's of 5s
Reviews.Author: daniel
Reviews.Content: iPhone 5sPRO'S1.New processor- chip run on 64 bit A7 chip which is said to be twice as fast as iPhone 5. Which is also desktop class2. Fingerprint scanner- Scans finger when you place on home button(does it pretty fast.3. Great camera- has 15 percent larger sensor and wider aperture. Also includes slow motion video and burst mode which takes multiple snaps at once( can shoot 10 pictures in a second).4. Available in three colors grey,black, and gold.CON'S1. Battery Life- There is a slight improvement in battery(which is about ten hours of talk time on 3g networks).2. ExpensiveOverall its a great phone if you that money to spare.

Reviews.Title: Good phone
Reviews.Author: Jennifer England
Reviews.Content: I was really mad at first because I thought I bought a broken phone. Phone works they gave me a charger that was no good

Reviews.Title: The best phone one can own!
Reviews.Author: Scott
Reviews.Content: This is the premier smartphone you can own. It is very clear from day one that it's not about your screen size but about holding this phone in you hand and being able to use it. It came with iOS 7 on it and I do plan to upgrade to iOS 8 this fall. This is the 3rd iPhone model that I have owned and I don't intend to switch to anything else. It is very clear why people switch to this platform from Android, Blackberry, and Symbian. Nothing beats the best. It is stable, secure, and very long battery life. The battery that comes built in lasts all day long. If you are not used to the lightweight nature of the iPhone 5 and like the weight of the iPhone 4 series of devices, put a Moshi JuicePack Air on it and more than double your battery life while giving it a nice case and the extra heft that your hands are used to. It takes awhile to get used to how lightweight this device is and to not let it slip out of your grip. I absolutely love the metal texture on the back it is cool to the touch. Siri is now a true pleasure to use and is a very good assistant. I look forward to each update and the apps automatically updating keeps me in step with making sure that nothing crashes. The camera and microphone on this device are excellent. Filming movies in 1080p is easy and using the special effects and the wonderful flash are amazing. Because of the JuicePack Air which I charge every night, I leave home with 200% battery and never turn off my wifi and use this as my watch, stop watch, alarm clock, camera, email, messaging, and my flashlight almost everywhere I go. LTE speed is fantastic and I hardly ever have any problems on the AT&T; network no matter where I travel or roam. AirPlay with my AppleTV and AirDrop both work fantastically. I was able to pair the Bluetooth with several car models and use the speakerphone and iPod features with no problems. I have also tested USB in-car device playback and it was very easy to use just like it always has been with every iPod and iPhone model. As a primary computer with the dual core A7 64-bit and the M7 graphics co-processor you never miss a beat. I used this as my primary computer for 4 months when my Macintosh was stolen. I was able to get most everything done that I needed to do, including using iWork and Pages to find a job and file billing information. iCloud is a dream to use compared to other cloud based services that just don't quite cut it and each year it gets even better. I really love iCloud Keychain the most because it's synchronized with my Mac and remembers all my credit cards and debit cards safely. I have setup iTunes Match as well and absolutely love having it going with my 10GB shared data plan. Now all my songs, movies, and TV shows go with me everywhere, and take up no space on the phone at all. I have used Android (1.5 - 4.2) and Windows Phone 7.x - 8.x quite a bit as well as Blackberry 10. None of them compare to what I get on iOS 7. The only one that is starting to come close is Windows Phone 8.1 and with what will happen in iOS 8.0 this fall, Microsoft you must work harder. I'm not going to say that the other devices don't deserve a place but the best part about owning an iPhone is that it stays up to date and as many devices as possible can install the updates with no problems. There are some devices that cannot and there are a lot of people that have iOS hardware that do not know how to use it properly because they don't take the time to learn how or have someone guide them through it. It really is not hard to learn and is a lot simpler than most computers. I would highly recommend this phone to someone who doesn't "get" computers and wants their first smart-device. Also do not worry about privacy and your fingerprint. It never even leaves the device not once and no apps not even those from Apple gain access to your fingerprint data, it's handled by a service of the hardware directly, you can set up as many fingerprints as you want but you must always have a PIN code or password setup as a backup and don't forget it because you will need it every time you restart the phone after a major update or plane trip. Overall it's good to be an iPhone user, I never have the problems that other phone users complain about.

Reviews.Title: The score I am hit to customer service, a staff name Racquel!!!
Reviews.Author: Lei Z.
Reviews.Content: The score I am hit to customer service, a staff name Racquel,I buy this phone in a month ago, because of some reasons lead to the phone I haven't use!Finally I reflect the problem to think name is Racquel staff, he is very careful, and have the patience to help me to solve this problem!

Reviews.Title: Was not unlocked as advertised
Reviews.Author: Christian Pineda
Reviews.Content: The phone did not come unlocked as advertised. When the package was delivered, it was stated in the bill that was locked onto the AT&T; Network, not Factory Unlocked as advertised.

Reviews.Title: Iphone 5s
Reviews.Author: Lele
Reviews.Content: I love my new Iphone 5s!!  It doesn't seem to have any glitches...  I love the thumb security.  Would recommend!

Reviews.Title: Daughter loves it
Reviews.Author: HeidiM
Reviews.Content: I am Android all the way and will never own one of these, but my daughter really wanted this and she loves it.

Reviews.Title: Great phone
Reviews.Author: Drew
Reviews.Content: I love my iPhone 5s. The fingerprint scanner is very convenient. Also you can still keep your passcode on at the same time.

Reviews.Title: I regret upgrading
Reviews.Author: AV
Reviews.Content: I had iPhone 4S. It was a fantastic phone. Fast, responsive, nimble, well built, solid. Just the right size for my hand. My right thumb reached top left corner of the screen.Why did I upgrade? Who talked me into it? Why didn't I talk to other people that had a 5s already? It is an oversize phone that is not quite a phablet yet not convenient to operate. Something has gone wrong during screen manufacturing and/or calibration. Screen is so sensitive to touch - sometimes it thinks someone touched it when nobody did. Took the iphone 5s to Apple Store, got a replacement - same issues. Apple store tech politely explained that my apps are buggy. Not really. Glitches all over the place with standard apps only, nothing 3d party.I want my iphone 4s back

Reviews.Title: said that the new. Аnd he scratched
Reviews.Author: Hennadiy
Reviews.Content: Said that the new. Phone scratched ...Do not get in touch. Said that you can unlock ....And it is not true

Reviews.Title: Shutting off constantly
Reviews.Author: Ronnel1989
Reviews.Content: I was hoping this wouldn't be a crApple product but after less than 2 months of use the phone shuts off randomly & as of lately refusing to boot up for hours.This is absolutely disgusting.

Reviews.Title: it is good
Reviews.Author: FeihanXie
Reviews.Content: i love this feeling to have a new phone, and it is the real phone, i bought in a real good price

Reviews.Title: Not much innovation here
Reviews.Author: CameraGuy
Reviews.Content: After using the iphone 5s for a month I decided to drop it and go with the galaxy s4,Iphones have came a long way but still need a ways to go before catching up with the best android phones.biggest con of this phone is the fingerprint scanner, It works ok but it's annoying to try to use every time you access your phone.I would rather not even have it on the phone, other than that nothing really to write home about, the camera on the galaxy s4 is worlds above this one in almost every aspect.Buy a galaxy S phone, you won't be disappointed!!!

Reviews.Title: I was in a rush that i ended up buying this
Reviews.Author: Sonia Aguayo
Reviews.Content: i could not insert a nano sim chip then i do not know if works. I noticed that if you buy the 64 GB from the apple store for Tmobile is cheaper than this one, also is unlocked. I didn't know about that.

Reviews.Title: Review and comments Apple Iphone 5s 16GB- silver
Reviews.Author: p. iedema
Reviews.Content: Product is great and  meet my expatations of a telephone what is needed to experience the modern world. Maybe wen ordered from Europe the adapter can be fit to match the european electricity outlets.Regards Peter

Reviews.Title: I didn't buy it, I just want to ask a question of this phone. If I buy the phone, can I use it in ATT prepaid plan?
Reviews.Author: Kevin Guanru WU
Reviews.Content: I didn't buy it, I just want to ask a question of this phone. If I buy the phone, can I use it in ATT prepaid plan?
